Text: RE Opening Weekendweldon PST You still headed down this afternoon Where are you staying tonight I plan to head down sometime this evening I hope to get out of here a little early but Ive got a hearing this am and dont really know what the day will be like Either way I dont plan on hunting this evening If you arent staying out at the trailer I take it that it is ok if I do anyway Chris Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October PM To Subject RE Opening Weekend Looks like my mom will be staying with Paul both nights at the trailer Im sorry for this misunderstanding Apparently Paul did not think about the fact that you may wantneed to stay there Anyway Ive now put the key under the wooden step platform at the trailer so you can free access to the trailer whenever you wish regardless of anyone being there absent this weekend obviously I told Paul I was going to do this so you and Weldon could have this access FYI Previously Weldon only stayed there when one of us was there There is a slight chance that my mom and Paul may want to use the trailer later in the season for a weekend with my sisters kids but nothing is planned currently Thats about the only other scenario I can see where it will not be available As I mentioned my plans currently are to hunt Fri Nov th pm Sun Nov th pm Some decent rutting activity Fri Nov th pm Mon Nov th pm Rut should be full tilt here Fri Nov rd pm Sun Nov th am May not get to hunt this weekend I should be staying at the trailer most but not all of those nights as Melissa will likely stay in Cuero some of those nights and I ll need to help her out with the kiddos a night or two Well see As for opening weekend looks like the weather will be OK This past weekend I saw several does and small bucks Paul saw a yr old pt that was OK but not a shooter The young bucks are trying to start chasing but thats not uncommon There still are not an abundance of rubs so I now the rut is not about th launch I would say that the peak rut may be a bit earlier this year but should still be somewhere between the th and th of Nov I cannot stress enough how important it is to concentrate your hunting during this period Chances of seeing a large buck at a feeder after Nov th are quite a bit lower Let me know what your plans are whenever you make them Good Luck Charlie This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant
